Reviews.Title: Powerful DVR with no support
Reviews.Author: TheGMan
Reviews.Content: This a high end dvr much cheaper than any other 16 channel DVRs. Beware, GVI is no longer in business.  I've used Samsung SHR dvrs and this one lacks some of the graphics.  For example, it lacks the graphical visual aid to search for events.  It has a event log but no graph-bar.The DVR has an embedded program for a pc interface.  I have google chrome and IE 9 on my computers.  I was unable to get it to run with either.  I'm not a techie so I hired a pc support company to help.  The technician was not able to get it to run with either of these, although, he did finally get it to work with IE 8.  Just a heads up.My DVR did not come with a full manual.  As of this posting you can still download it from the internet.

Reviews.Title: Samsung GVI AR-6160
Reviews.Author: Budro
Reviews.Content: IP Cam Viewer app (Free) will work for remote viewing on an android phone. App works with GVI AR-6040 and AR-6080. These are great units if found at bargain prices.

Reviews.Title: Very nice DVR
Reviews.Author: Nicholas Scruggs
Reviews.Content: Very good DVR really is 1080p HD video.Doesn't have a really good playback options for motion events (no timeline or previews)Also The Iphone app does not work because the company no longer exist anymore.You can buy on ebay from cme2bid for 225.00
